value.excerpt: Patrick looks at how you can get relative dates, in Power BI Desktop, without using the relative date slicer or relative date filters. value.title: Power BI XMLA Endpoint: Why you should care

value.title: SQL Server in Microsoft Fabric? Use CETaS to move data!
value.excerpt: People have been asking "What about SQL Server?" with regards to Microsoft Fabric. Bob Ward joins us to show a way you can get your SQL data into Fabric with CETaS and the power of shortcuts in OneLake. And, then use that data in Power BI! value.title: Age Calculation in Power BI using Power Query
value.excerpt: Power Query has a simple way of calculating the age. However, because DAX is the popular language in many calculations in Power BI, many are not aware of this function in Power Query.
